DASH_KEY.description: A shared key that allows dashboards to authorize pours.

DB_HOST.description: The host of the database to connect with. Only tested with mysql.

DB_USER.description: The user to connect to the database with.

DB_PASS.description: The password to connect to the database.

DEFAULT_ADMIN.description: A json list of properties defining the default admin. [url, badge, name, email, password]

EMAIL_FROM.description: The email address to send emails from.

EMAIL_USER.description: The user to send emails using.

EMAIL_PASS.description: The password of the email user.

SLACK_URL.description: Webhook used to post pours to slack

UBER_URL.description: URL of the uber server to query users from

UBER_KEY.description: The uber api key to use

ADMINS.description: A json list of users to be made admins

name: coldbrew
description: Coldbrew payment and consumption tracking dashboard.
